official_title: A bill to designate the Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness in the State of Arizona.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness Act - Designates certain lands in Arizona as the Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness in the State of Arizona.
